name: useScrollLock
description: A custom hook that locks and unlocks scroll.

props.name: options
props.description: Options to configure the hook, by default it will lock the scroll automatically.

schema.name: autoLock
schema.description: Whether to lock the scroll initially.

schema.name: lockTarget
schema.description: The target element to lock the scroll (default is the body element).

schema.name: widthReflow
schema.description: Whether to prevent width reflow when locking the scroll.
